user.description: Setup a Telenet Telementer sensor, username and password are required. Please indicate if internet and/or mobile usage is to be tracked.

edit.description: Edit Setup a Telenet Telemeter sensor, username and password are required. Please indicate if internet and/or mobile usage is to be tracked.

error.missing username: Please provide a valid Telenet username
error.missing password: Please provide a valid Telenet password
error.missing internet: Please indicate if internet usage is to be tracked
error.missing mobile: Please indicate if mobile usage is to be tracked
error.no_valid_settings: No valid settings, provide username, password, internet & mobile in ha config.
